# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import requests
import sys
import io
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)

BASE_URL = ''http://localhost:8090''

# 1. 创建一个 Cube 作为预制体源
print\(''1. 创建 MyCube 对象...''\)
resp = requests.post\(f''{BASE_URL}/skill/gameobject_create'', json={
    ''name'': ''MyCube'',
    ''primitiveType'': ''Cube'',
    ''x'': 0, ''y'': 1, ''z'': 0
}, timeout=30\)
print\(''   结果:'', resp.json\(\)[''result'']\)

# 2. 创建预制体
print\(\)
print\(''2. 将 MyCube 保存为预制体...''\)
resp = requests.post\(f''{BASE_URL}/skill/prefab_create'', json={
    ''gameObjectName'': ''MyCube'',
    ''savePath'': ''Assets/Prefabs/MyCube.prefab''
}, timeout=30\)
print\(''   结果:'', resp.json\(\)[''result'']\)

# 3. 验证预制体存在
print\(\)
print\(''3. 验证预制体资源...''\)
resp = requests.post\(f''{BASE_URL}/skill/asset_get_info'', json={
    ''assetPath'': ''Assets/Prefabs/MyCube.prefab''
}, timeout=30\)
print\(''   结果:'', resp.json\(\)[''result'']\)
""")
